message.body: Happy pi day!
Hey! Planning=fail. Want to come for dinner tonight?
Bleh, my bad. What time? I might could swing it
No pressure! We'd love to see you if you have time. Any time after 7 works.
Maybe around 8:30?
Great! Spanikopita is on the menu
Yay, love it! What should I bring? Wine? Desert?
Red wine! Dessert is covered
Gotcha!
Thanks :)
Random last-minute: jared diamond lecture, upenn, 7 pm
Yaya, I'm here!
Oh! On my way to see if i can get in w/o a ticket
No tix needed!
Sweet! Be there soon
Hope you made it home safe!! Thanks again for hanging out.... Hope it didn't set you too far back school wise!
I'm home and happily studying! Thanks for a super fun night
Yayay, and thanks to you too!
What time does the show start?
It was a great set! Sorry we couldn't stay longer :)
Aw, I'm just glad you got to come at all!
Do you like Edith Piaf?
The french singer? Not sure, actually... It's music so, probably yes.
:-) there's a cabaret tonight at the Wilma... Piaf music, can-can dancers, etc, was wonderin if you and/or the lady would like to join? 10:00, $10!
Aw! I'm sick with a cold, so staying in tonight. Text sarah though- she went to see a 7:00 show but may be interested
Aw, feel better!
Sorry you lost yr phone! - Kennedy
On our way!
Fun night! please tell jeremy great show!
Would it be ok if j tagged along tonight?
Of course! I'm planning to get there around 5:30; lecture starts at 6.
Cool! See ya at 5:30!
How's about 8 for movie times? I can do up some dinner as well if ya like!
Hi have to raincheck movie night~ Sarah just got called to go on at the Arden (understudy) so I'm going to see the show! You're welcome to join - curtain's at 7
Ps still really excited to see labyrinth and th other one!! Maybe we can do another evening this week?
Oh awesome! Fer sure, maybe tomorrow? Enjoy the show!
Still on for movie night tonight? If so may Sarah join us?
Sure! I have to leave at 10:45, so does 8 work? Or earlier, I'll be around. Also, dinner?
Ok! How about 7:30? What can we bring? mango juice, potato salad, brownies, wine?
Sounds good! All of the above...whatever you feel like! .and what do you want on yr pizza? Gonna make homemade and headed to the store now.... Thinking Gouda and apples for starters.....
Yum! sounds perfect
On our way- be there in ~20
K!
New cooking goal: homemade bagels! I will definitely need backup. Are you in多 (Cool, my new phone does a Spanish upside down 多多多 !)
Yea! I've done english muffins, but bagels sound awesome! Tomorrow afternoon?
Well I'm in Reading, then Florida, Delaware, Cleveland. So maybe sometime in life??? Will be in touch...
Haha, great, have fun!
Having a bbq dinner gathering at our house tomorrow night (sunday) - would you like to come over? veg options = yes!
Yes!! What time?
Anytime is fine to show up. Maybe grilling around 7? 8? I'll be in touch again tomorrow with updates. excited to see you!
Yay, glad to see you too!
Come over anytime after 6. grilling maybe 7ish is the plan. Also mojitos with garden mint
Huzzah! Prolly 7/7:30 for me, will try to make it there lickity split!
Gah, still in s phila, sorry!
No prob - see you whenev. bike safely!
So sorry to miss you.... :-(. When are you back in town?
I am eating yr pasta salad and it's making my belly happy. Mmmm. Thanks! Hope yr birthday was lovely!
You are my hero. Seriously, you are amazing. Great opening night!!! Xoxo
Judith! You are too much. Thank you so much!
Hi superstar, just letting you know I'm going to the beach! So no naked biking for me today. If you go have double fun for me!
Oh, sweet! Have fun!
A "cashier" injured my throat; hence I am getting capogiro before wired. Join?
Yes. Will try to get off work earlier - should be fine. 3:15? 20th and Sansom? Sorry about your throat!!!
3:15 sounds good! Yup! Thanks!
I'll probably be a few mins late...
Seeing Devil 7 Mr. Punch tonight - you? Did you do your 200 situps today?
12th night at 7 for me...and yes I did! Ow....wanna meet/come over for a drink/dinner before?
Can i bring a date?
(it would be sarah). I did one crunch when I sat up in bed this morning
As long as it's a tall blonde...
Oh good
Yes or whatever is most convenient. I'm by whole foods- need anything?
Dinner? Drink?
Will do. be there in 15
I'm just gonna whip up some pasta...mmm, maybe a little goat cheese and I can make a salad! Thanks!
Coming to Elephant room? want to meet before for dinnersnackfood?
Ok I'll be in a show from 7-8:30 at 22nd and Chestnut :)
Maybbbeew....will get back to you
Ok! Will letcha know!
Yeah elephant room was definitely a show requiring a flask. Have triple fun for me tonight! wow I cannot keep up with all the partying
Hey lady, going to see Jim's pirate cabaret at 10:00 if you'd like to join
Hmmmm, if I can get out of here by then! Got a lot of cleaning to do still...will try to meetcha there!
Nice. think Mary Poppins!
Haha, thanks!
Can't go yet :-(. Have fun! See ya tomorrow?
Ok I'll miss you! see you soon
Sorry - being vague about tomorrow b/c it's a maybe...
Good thing you didn't come - it's $25!! and no discounts for being Jim's roommate and a student. But in good news, I'm on a pirate ship!!!
Ai yikes! You need to give Jim a talking to...but I'm sure pirate ships and sexy ladies will be worth it!
And hope you can come tomorrow!
Hi! You should come to my musem (Academy of Natural Sciences) to see the shell show this weekend! I'll let you in free... :D
until 5:00
Yay! How late you there today?
Ok!
Cool, I have a couch surfer coming, if she gets in, will try to bring her by. Grab a drink/coffee after regardless?
Still waiting on my surfer, so will come for shells tomorrow, but still down to hang after! There's a hoedown in Kensington if you wanna go, or we can just grab a drink in the area!
Cool. Do you mean tonight or tomorrow? I have some hw to do, so probably no ho-down (but that sounds awesome!) Def up for a brief drink or tea or ice cream
Aw, sorry you can't come ho down! Surfer is on her way here so we can meetcha for any of the above! Hmmm, now, where is there ice cream btwn my house and the museum....
Mugshots? they have smoothies and coffee drinks
Yes!
Surely! See ya there around 5:20 ish?
I'ma here, on couch hiding in corner
Hey! did you go on yet? shall I come by?
Come! We're on in half an hour! Yay!
Ok!
Happy Hannukah!
Happy Hanukkah to you too!
Will you be home between 12:30 and 1 today? If so, may I stop by bearing gift?
Oh sure! (I'm just waking up.....:-)
good morning! on my way - be there in 10 :)
Awesome!
You ate so amazing. I'm so sorry I missed you! Have lovely holidays!
You too on all counts! Happy New Year!!
Interested in a little science adventure? Stargazing via telescope at the Franklin Institute, 6-9 pm, $5
Tonight? I get out of rehearsal at 6, may be able!
yep. I think it's just an open event; there is some kind of presentation at 7. I'll probably get there at 6:30ish
Def can't get there till at least 7:30.... I'll keep ya posted!
Ok - and alsoo I'll keep you posted on how awesome (or not) it is. Also going to see west philly orch at tritone at 10
Ooo how much is it? Love dem. that might be more feasible....
$5 I was told
Awesome. I gotta get home and grab some food and will letcha know where I'm at!
Grabbing food and hot chocolate around Rittenhouse then off to tritone! maybe see you there
Brawr. Want to come. So tired tho, I don't think I'd be good company. If I get a second wind around 9:30 I'll letcha know! If not, have a great time and thx for the invites!
Thank you again for the fabulous pie day! Heard the lamb won...yr truly amazing :-)
It was lovely to see you!
Hi! Got any extra postcards? If so I'll take a short stack (because postcards are like pancakes)
I'll drench em in butter and syrup just for you :-)
Yum! when can I come get them? are you going to west philly orch tonight?
I am not doing anything really until we open :-( but where are they playing? There is a slim possibility...if not, I can find you any time after Sunday! Thanks lady!
At underground arts. also i'm happy to come to you at some point when it's convenient
Oh sweet! I may try to bring my parents. What time?
3 sets, starting at 10 pm

Sorry I missed wpo last week! The show opening has yet to negate all the crazy in my schedule, but I'll be out fringin all week...maybe I'll see you at the bar? Or at a show? I'll be at crave on Sunday!
yes and yes! congrats on great reviews from everyone. I'm coming Monday the 17th! Fringe-viewing schedule is up on FB. tonight is applied mechanics show
Yes! Me too! I'll see you there!
randomness: Is there a video of waterbears? If so... Is it up online? (hi, by the way :) and happy 12-12-12)
Yes! Just type water bears in space in YouTube and it will come up! Happy ....12.13.12......! Hope alls well!
yep! I was going to make some burritos at 6:00
You still wanna go to flying donkey tonight?
ok :)
Cool. I may have a client from 6-7 at 57th st but haven't heard from her yet so I'll keep ya posted!
Hey! I went home and fell asleep. Now I'm doing laundry and stuff...I don't wanna bail on you tho! Is anyone else going?
You will be missing homemade veg soup, bread, taffy apples, and puppets! I do have other people though if you can't make it.

Gah that sounds amazing....I hate this weather, as soon as I come home and bundle up I lose all desire to get back on my bike. Are you guys driving to the show? Maybe I can trolley out there...gah! Naps ruin everything!
really want to do is hibernate
Aw, I know. I do not have the car tonight unfortunately. naps do get in the way, and winter! I am overcompensating by doing too many things, when all I
Way to show me up :-p ok. Ok. I can do this. I will not let winter beat me! See you sooooooooon!
Yay! You can do it!
Thank you again SO MUCH!! You are awesome.
you are awesome too! Lets have dinner again soon-- I don't approve of your onlly-beans diet
It's so full of fiber tho.....
